Class LauncherAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction

          com.yifanlu.Kindle.LauncherAction
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
LauncherMenu, LauncherScript
public abstract class LauncherAction
extends com.amazon.ebook.booklet.reader.sdk.ui.ReaderAction
implements java.lang.Runnable

A menu item for Launcher. Contains the item's text, its priority, and the task it should perform when called.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Yifan Lu

compareTo

public int compareTo(java.lang.Object other)
Compares this item to another one. They are compared first by priority and next by their text labels.

Specified by:
